For his part, Page said that Eric Schmidt has clearly done an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade. The results speak for themselves. There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly. Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader and I have learned innumerable lessons from him. His advice and efforts will be invaluable to me as I start in this new role. Allen Iverson 's still hurting Former All-Star Allen Iverson , 35, could miss the rest of the regular season and the playoffs with Turkish team Besiktas because of painful calcium deposits in his calf. He tried to tough it out and continue to play while over in Turkey, said Dr. James Andrews, who added Allen Iverson needs at least 6-8 weeks of rest. "However, he got to the point where he could not really run up and down the court." Back
